contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 9th day of November, 2001, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED. The order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. See Bourdeev v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Dep’t of Transp., Bureau of Driver Licensing, 755 A.2d 59 (Pa.Commw.2000), aff'd, 13 EAP 2001, 782 A.2d 539, 2001 WL 1301496 (Pa. Oct.26, 2001).
